Dark Tentacle.desc:
# _“Conjure dark forces to summon a hex tentacle. Quickly repeated casts increase the amount of tentacles summoned but also put a toll on your body.”_

## Stats

- **Cooldown:** 2 Seconds
- **Base Damage:** 3.5
- **Scaling:** 1.0 Hex
- **Damage Type:** 1.0 Hex

## Requirements

- **Hex Scaling:** 0.8

## Preview

![RobloxPlayerBeta\_pqtMyuexuc.gif](https://trello.com/1/cards/63ddca3ebfa58685b6036157/attachments/6473d5ffd05e6e9f118f72ec/download/RobloxPlayerBeta_pqtMyuexuc.gif)

## Notes

- Limit of 5 tentacles per cast
- Only the final tentacle of each cast deals knockback
- Self damage and stun increases with consecutive casts
- Proc coefficient decreases with consecutive casts (Limit of 0.3 at 10 Casts)
- Every hit guardbreaks
- Cooldown gets increased depending on negative [https://trello.com/c/xejlS57Y/1305-attack-speed](https://trello.com/c/xejlS57Y/1305-attack-speed "smartCard-inline")
- Applies [**Tentacle Strain**](https://trello.com/c/24FpzPhh/1568-neutral-status-effects "‌") to self upon cast:
- Cannot be unlocked via Hybrid Scaling bonus

Curse Flame Ray.desc:
# _“Use your eyes to blast out a ray of cursed flames but take damage in return!”_

## Stats

- **Cooldown:** 20 Seconds
- **Base Damage:** 28 (Ray), 1.4 (Explosion)
- **Scaling:** Same as weapon
- **Damage Type:** 0.5 Fire 0.5 Hex

## Requirements

- **Hex Scaling:** 0.4
- **Fire Scaling:** 0.4

## Preview

![RobloxPlayerBeta\_cQ3dy2IiXc.gif](https://trello.com/1/cards/63d7b107756e131ed1ed77b9/attachments/662d8ffe9760dcd55fe0b71a/download/RobloxPlayerBeta_cQ3dy2IiXc.gif)

## Notes

- The explosion hits before the ray
- Sets the user on fire (regular burn)
- Self-burn lasts for 5 seconds
- Applies [https://trello.com/c/yJkXmiBs/343-cursed-flames](https://trello.com/c/yJkXmiBs/343-cursed-flames "smartCard-inline") to enemies hit
- Guardbreaks

Gnawing Poison.desc:
# Hitting an opponent with a finisher bites all enemies you have poisoned dealing a burst of hex damage. Has a cooldown. Grants poison potency.

## Stats

- Base damage of 8 per 1 of this perk
- Has 0.5 Hex and 0.5 Physical damage type
- Has 0.75 Hex and 0.75 Physical scaling
- Has a cooldown of 2 seconds

Grounded Despair.desc:
# Jumping and landing causes you to create a small shockwave and get a debuff called despair. Despair increases damage dealt.

## Stats

- Shockwave has 0.5 Hex and 0.5 Physical damage type
- Applies [Despair](https://trello.com/c/x8uXtJCj/1410-perk-debuffs "‌") of 0.1 potency per 1 of this perk
  (despair grants +7.5% damage per 0.1 debuff potency)
  (Affected by [https://trello.com/c/luvGQlb3/275-warding](https://trello.com/c/luvGQlb3/275-warding "smartCard-inline")and considered a self debuff, so [https://trello.com/c/KXq6muib/370-trickster](https://trello.com/c/KXq6muib/370-trickster "smartCard-inline") can also affect it)

## Notes

- You need to actually jump and land for the shockwave and debuff to be applied
- Shockwave has a lowered chance to proc other effects

Wild Bolt.desc:
# Modifies the laser weapon art to become a random damage type, enhances the attributes, and makes laser apply random debuffs.

## Stats

- Makes Laser deal +50% damage with an additional ~23% for every 1 of this perk after the first 1
  dmgBoost = `50% + (3/13 * (perkAmount - 1))`
- Changes Laser to 1.0 damage type of any Magic constituent element (Fire, Water, Holy, Hex, Earth, Air)
- Applies any 1 debuff from the same pool as [https://trello.com/c/wx3zLf0N/27-dark-elf](https://trello.com/c/wx3zLf0N/27-dark-elf "smartCard-inline") at the same potency

## Notes

- Increases size of Laser very slightly and also increases range slightly scaling with perk amount

Hex Boost.desc: #Increases the effectiveness of hex scaling weapons and skills.

Concealed Edge.desc:
# Standing in shadows increases the range of your weapon and deals bonus damage.

## Stats

- Adds 0.15 Hex damage type to your attacks

## Notes

- Works on DoT effects
- Works with modified finishers (Such as [https://trello.com/c/MMcUy2OA/417-locked-and-loaded](https://trello.com/c/MMcUy2OA/417-locked-and-loaded "smartCard-inline")) despite not increasing the range visually

Cursed Flames.desc:
# Burn weakens and deals dmg as hex. Grants burn potency.

## Preview

![RobloxPlayerBeta\_jlsJcGbe4s.gif](https://trello.com/1/cards/63d7913f9d90968f2a4fdb69/attachments/65d13b343cdbbba514908312/download/RobloxPlayerBeta_jlsJcGbe4s.gif)

## Notes

- Stacks with [Weakening](https://trello.com/c/nLaTaSRY/1388-debuffs "‌")
- Increases duration of the burn despite not being mentioned anywhere in the description
- Changes burn DoT damage type from 1.0 Fire to 0.5 Fire and 0.5 Hex
- Changes scaling from 1.5 Fire to 1 Fire and 1 Hex

## Formula (Weakening)

#### weakenPotency = `( 10 + base burn dmg ) / 10`

- Base burn damage here is burn damage with only the source’s multiplier, ignoring any other damage boost [https://trello.com/c/uc5u9d2q/1247-burn-potency](https://trello.com/c/uc5u9d2q/1247-burn-potency "smartCard-inline") (Really annoying-impossible to figure out)
- Every 1 [https://trello.com/c/S0DtlSY6/298-ignition](https://trello.com/c/S0DtlSY6/298-ignition "smartCard-inline") = ~4% Weaken with Cursed Flames (from very early testing)

Draconic Blood.desc:
# Your rune infusion is forced as a draconic ability from the draconic shrine. The more of this perk you have the more damage your draconic abilities do. If you are not dragon blooded your abilities deal less damage.

## Preview

**Dragon Claw (Tier 1)**

![RobloxPlayerBeta\_Tkwf5BPBHh.gif](https://trello.com/1/cards/65f7ab465b01f7b89162ed49/attachments/65f7e294232ec48810dbae51/download/RobloxPlayerBeta_Tkwf5BPBHh.gif)

**Dragon Infusion (Tier 2)**

![RobloxPlayerBeta\_5exf9XpB1H.gif](https://trello.com/1/cards/65f7ab465b01f7b89162ed49/attachments/65f8bad668e478aa2bbe5f3c/download/RobloxPlayerBeta_5exf9XpB1H.gif)

**Dragon Bubble (Tier 3)**

![RobloxPlayerBeta\_PR8mMFkJg7.gif](https://trello.com/1/cards/65f7ab465b01f7b89162ed49/attachments/65f8c5770fcc33271eedfb2c/download/RobloxPlayerBeta_PR8mMFkJg7.gif)

---

## Dragon Claw

- 25 base damage (Increases by 2.5 for every 1 of this perk)
- 1.0 scaling
- 5 second cooldown
- Guardbreaks

## Dragon Infusion

- Applies a certain Damage Type to your attacks (See Color Variation)
- Potency of the buff is `perkAmount/10`
- +0.1 damage type of your respective color per 0.1 buff potency
  (For Physical Draco, +0.075 per 0.1 buff potency)
- Damage type applies to all attacks
- Lasts 20 seconds
- 35 second cooldown

## Dragon Bubble

- 20 base damage (Increases by 2 for every 1 of the perk)
- 1.0 scaling
- 7 second cooldown
- Detonates immediately upon contacting an enemy
- Goes through walls
- Does _not_ guardbreak

---

## Color Variation

- Damage type and scaling of the ability depends on your skin color as a [https://trello.com/c/83NFiDgQ/28-dragon-blooded](https://trello.com/c/83NFiDgQ/28-dragon-blooded "smartCard-inline")
- Red is Fire, White is Air, etc.
- If you are not Dragon Blooded the type is Physical

## Attack Stats (Claw, Bubble)

- Red (Fire): x1.2 Speed, Applies Burn
- White (Air): x2 Speed, x2 Knockback, x0.75 Cooldown (directly reduces CD by 25% without diminishing returns)
- Green (Earth): x1.5 Damage, x1.5 Stun, x0.7 Speed
- Light Blue (Water): x1.1 Damage, x1.2 Speed, x1.2 Stun, additionally Heals and cleanses allies
- Yellow (Holy): Heals allies (at a better rate than Water)
- Purple (Hex): 1.2x Stun, applies [Weaken](https://trello.com/c/nLaTaSRY/1388-debuffs "‌") alongside 3 chances to apply a random debuff
  (Weaken potency is 0.1 per 1 Draconic Blood)
- Previews were done before this was added

Infusion does not have any special properties.

## Notes

- This perk is affected by [https://trello.com/c/hOIt1DVI/1295-perk-effectiveness](https://trello.com/c/hOIt1DVI/1295-perk-effectiveness "smartCard-inline")

Emotional.desc:
# Having only buffs lowers your weapon art cooldown and makes your weapon art deal bonus hex damage, having only debuffs gives bonus fire damage and attack speed. But having both debuffs and buffs gives bonus healing.

## Stats

- +20% attack speed per 1 of this perk
- +60% WA CDR per 1 of this perk
  (has diminishing returns i.e. uses `CD/(1+CDR%)` formula)
- +0.2 Fire damage output per 1 of this perk
- +0.2 Hex damage output on weapon arts per 1 of this perk
- +20% bonus healing per 1 of this perk

## Notes

- Bonus healing affects both incoming and outgoing healing

Fell Rush.desc:
# Inflicting a debuff inflicts a debuff that links you to the opponent rmbing launches you towards them with dark feathers dealing hex and air damage.

## Preview

![ApplicationFrameHost\_0cejLvDVzU.gif](https://trello.com/1/cards/668b79a742d9c48bb0d3526b/attachments/668b82a1cf8cb5794ca1aae8/download/ApplicationFrameHost_0cejLvDVzU.gif)

## Stats

- 0.5 Hex and 0.5 Air damage type
- Has Hex and Air scaling
- Base damage is increased by 10% per 1 of this perk
- Tether lasts ~10 seconds **(Not actually a debuff)**

## Notes

- You need to be a certain distance away from the enemy to activate this
- Where I am in the preview is about the range it procs at
  (Use the tree roots as reference)
- Damage and explosion size are increased by perk amount _and_ distance from the enemy
- Scaling is also increased by distance from the enemy
- Guardbreaks
- Deals no knockback
- Has a short cooldown
- You can only have one tether at a time
- If anything (Terrain, players, etc.) is in between you and your target, you will instead teleport to whatever is obstructing the path
- Combines with [https://trello.com/c/wowwLxQv/1140-divine-crash](https://trello.com/c/wowwLxQv/1140-divine-crash "smartCard-inline") if both are activated with the same RMB

Sickness.desc:
# You have a chance to sneeze randomly dealing hex and earth damage infront of your character.

## Preview

![ApplicationFrameHost\_pxweIjRcdd.gif](https://trello.com/1/cards/653d9ab114284368b03ad706/attachments/653da10936b0988d401dd35d/download/ApplicationFrameHost_pxweIjRcdd.gif)

## Notes

- Damage scales off Hex and Earth boost (Presumably also perk amount)
- Has 0.75 Hex and Earth scaling
- Stacking this perk will increase the frequency of the sneezes
- Applies a green version of [Sticky](https://trello.com/c/nLaTaSRY/1388-debuffs "‌")
- Functionally the exact same as normal sticky, isn’t a separate debuff
- Able to proc other effects
- Seems to be affected by [https://trello.com/c/kq5hk0M9/470-lucky](https://trello.com/c/kq5hk0M9/470-lucky "smartCard-inline")

Storm Rend.desc:
# A chance to create chain lightning on hit and apply a debuff that reduces armor and increases stun taken.

## Preview

![RobloxPlayerBeta\_hX1o28t078.gif](https://trello.com/1/cards/63d797458552552526acd3c0/attachments/6512345bcb18146856f0c08e/download/RobloxPlayerBeta_hX1o28t078.gif)

## Notes

- Provides 10 armor penetration per 1 of this perk
- Chain lightning deals half as much damage to enemies that the chain lightning wasn’t procced on
- Not affected by [https://trello.com/c/bxUEGhNf/348-darkening-hex](https://trello.com/c/bxUEGhNf/348-darkening-hex "smartCard-inline")

Toxin Transfer.desc:
# Hitting someone when poisoned does bonus hex damage and poisons them. Grants poison potency.

## Notes

- Procs before [https://trello.com/c/jrCW1P01/418-curse-rip](https://trello.com/c/jrCW1P01/418-curse-rip "smartCard-inline")

True Balance.desc:
# Your hex and holy stat are added together and distributed evenly. All healing now has additional hex scaling, and all damage has additional holy scaling.

## Formulas

Heal Boost = `1 + (2/3) * perkAmount / 10 * hexBoost`

Damage Boost = `1 + (2/3) * perkAmount / 10 * holyBoost`

Vile Presence.desc:
# Deals hex dmg to nearby enemies over time.

## Stats

- Deals hex damage continuously (once every tick) to all enemies in range
- Base damage of `0.6 * perkAmount`
- 1.0 Hex scaling
- 1.0 Hex output

## Notes

- Damage and area of effect increase with perk amount
- Particles will appear indicating the AoE every tick
- Not a DoT effect

Void Rage.desc:
# Convert rage into Void Rage, which gives stun resistance and bonus hex damage type.

## Preview

![ApplicationFrameHost\_EEFI7DXYHi.gif](https://trello.com/1/cards/63d7803b65e3bcc3a959f1b6/attachments/65d13886ed3945e13eb90259/download/ApplicationFrameHost_EEFI7DXYHi.gif)

## Stats

- Lowers stun by 0.1 seconds per 1 of this perk
- Hex Damage output is 0.1 per 1 of this perk

## Notes

- The stun resistance does not count for [https://trello.com/c/4hAOM12f/1284-ferocity](https://trello.com/c/4hAOM12f/1284-ferocity "smartCard-inline")
- Bonus Hex Damage applies to all damage, even debuffs
- Won’t apply to summons
- Stacks with [https://trello.com/c/yB6mqPJP/1296-frenzy](https://trello.com/c/yB6mqPJP/1296-frenzy "smartCard-inline"), but replaces the particles
- Not actually a separate buff from [Rage](https://trello.com/c/Q30EI0E4/1387-buffs "‌")

Hex Shield.desc:
# Gain a shield ocassionally that block the next debuff you receive. When it blocks a debuff you also receive some healing and a buff that gives damage boost.

---

## Preview (Hex Shield)

![ezgif-1-ab04fe8458.gif](https://trello.com/1/cards/6518a1f5d9401f9dea9784f3/attachments/664d8ba651585b7ebaf0d106/download/ezgif-1-ab04fe8458.gif)

## Stats (Hex Shield)

- Every 1 of this perk gives you a shield that blocks 1 debuff each
- 10 second cooldown
  (Starts again immediately after being procced)
- Base heal of 1.5

## Notes (Hex Shield)

- This is a _neutral status effect_, neither a buff nor a debuff
- Works on self-inflicted debuffs
- Cooldown of each shield is not independent from each other
  (2nd shield will only start its cooldown after the 1st has cooled down completely)

---

## Preview (Converted Energy)

![Discord\_zCc3c5tqET.gif](https://trello.com/1/cards/6518a1f5d9401f9dea9784f3/attachments/664d8bb9732f8cf763dbadc9/download/Discord_zCc3c5tqET.gif)

(The blue lightning-like particles)

## Stats (Converted Energy)

- Buff potency is the perk amount divided by 10
- +10% damage boost per 0.1 buff potency
- 10 seconds duration (At 1 of the perk)

## Notes (Converted Energy)

- This is a buff
- If Hex Shield procs again when Converted Energy is active, it just refreshes the duration of Converted Energy

Undead Might.desc:
# Weapon arts and runes gain bonus damage but you take self damage when hitting an opponent with a rune or weapon art.

## Notes

- 25% bonus damage every 1 of the perk
- Self damage scales with the damage dealt
- Self damage is Earth and Hex
